articles.title: The genius behind Zelda is at the peak of his power — and feeling his age - The Washington Post
articles.description: Eiji Aonuma designed marionettes before overseeing Zelda, the wildly popular video game series. Its latest title, “Tears of the Kingdom,” has sold 10 million copies.
